thread.title: Bangkok bomb suspect bribed border police several times
thread.title_full: Bangkok bomb suspect bribed border police several times | News24

author: news24.com
title: Bangkok bomb suspect bribed border police several times
text:
Bangkok - A suspect in the Bangkok bombing bribed his way across the border with Cambodia several times, police said on Thursday.
Mieraili Yusufu, aged 25, was said to have bribed immigration officials at the Sa Kaeo border crossing "at least 5 or 6 times," Police Chief Somyot Poompanmouang told reporters.
Yusufu, who was arrested on the Cambodian border, has admitted to possessing bomb-making materials and handing the explosives to the bomber hours before the blast on August 17.
The explosion killed 20 people and injured more than 100.
